task.title: How to Add a Google+ Button in WebHelp Output
task.shortdesc: See how you can add a Google+ widget into WebHelp output.

context.p: To add a Google+ widget to your WebHelp output, follow these steps:

step.stepresult: The right-side area displays the code and a preview of the button.

step.cmd: Copy the code snippet displayed in the preview area into a div element inside an XML file called google-plus-button.xml.
step.stepresult: Make sure that the content of the file is well-formed. The content of the XML file should look like this:

step.cmd: Duplicate an existing WebHelp transformation scenario (depending on your needs, it may be with or without feedback, or the mobile variant).
Switch to the Parameters tab and edit the webhelp.footer.file parameter to reference the google-plus-button.xml file created earlier.
